short_summary: CANADA NEEDS A UNIT FOR MAINTENANCE PURPOSES AND FAST SERVICABILITY
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
**Title**: W0102-23146S - Aircraft Wheel Washers System
**Reference Number**: WS4285032625-Doc4390463636
**Amendment Number**: 7

## Tender Overview

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4285032625
* **Publication Date**: January 15, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 29, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 7, 2024
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

## Service Description

Canada's Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking offers from qualified vendors to provide one (1) wheel washer system to support the maintenance requirements of the 14 Air Maintenance Squadron (AMS).

The tendered service aims to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and maintain the operational readiness of the 14 AMS. The successful offeror will be responsible for delivering a wheel washer system that meets the specifications and standards outlined in the tender documents.

## Tender Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact:
Arseneau, Danny (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [danny.arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:danny.arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Ariba Discovery URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18489079?extsite=MTg0ODkwNzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==> 

Best regards,
Technical Writer.
